Career Profile

Result focused and open source enthusiast with experience in facilitating, gathering requirements and collaborating with senior architects to transform business problems into technical solutions using SQL BI databases and tools. Experience in accurately performing research, reporting and documentation activities within demanding time frames.

Strong ability to work well in teams, to identify goals and priorities. Proven track record of taking ownership of issues, identifying the root cause and fixing it. Capacity to work independently, commit to deliverables whilst quickly learning and selecting new tools and methodologies for projects.
